character.age: 250 years, appears 25 due to elven physiology
character.background: Azura was born in the crystal caves of El'goroth, a realm of ancient magic and forgotten lore. She is the last child of the Starweaver bloodline, a family renowned for their mastery over the arcane arts.

physical-appearance.hair-color: Dark indigo with silvery undertones, falls in loose waves down her back
